languages.text: {n}Изможденные, сломленные люди переглядываются. Детина рядом с вами медлит несколько мгновений, а потом сплевывает и оскаливается.{/n} "А, все равно подыхать — так хоть без клейма еретика! Бей тварей!"

{n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"
languages.original_text: {n}Изможденные, сломленные люди переглядываются. Детина рядом с вами медлит несколько мгновений, а потом сплевывает и оскаливается.{/n} "А, все равно подыхать — так хоть без клейма еретика! Бей тварей!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated people trade worried glances. The big roughneck next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well go out without heretic's brand! Kill the alien!"

{n}Exhausted and defeated people trade worried glances. The big roughneck next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well go out without heretic's brand! Kill the alien!"

{n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well go out without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

{n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well go out without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

{n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

{n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

languages.text: {n}疲れ果てて打ちひしがれた表情の男達が、困惑して視線を交わす。隣にいる巨体の男は、尻込みしたものの、唾を吐いてニカッと笑った。{/n}「どうせ死ぬなら、異端者の烙印はない方がマシだ！獣共を殺せ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}疲れ果てて打ちひしがれた表情の男達が、困惑して視線を交わす。隣にいる巨体の男は、尻込みしたものの、唾を吐いてニカッと笑った。{/n}「どうせ死ぬなら、異端者の烙印はない方がマシだ！獣共を殺せ！」

languages.text: {n}疲惫不堪的战士们满脸忧虑地互相看着。你身边的大块头犹豫了片刻，随后吐了口唾沫，咧嘴一笑。{/n}“反正我们已经死定了，还不如像个正派人一样战斗到最后一刻！宰了这群畜生！”
languages.original_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}疲惫不堪的战士们满脸忧虑地互相看着。你身边的大块头犹豫了片刻，随后吐了口唾沫，咧嘴一笑。{/n}“反正我们已经死定了，还不如像个正派人一样战斗到最后一刻！宰了这群畜生！”

languages.text: {n}Démoralisés, épuisés, les combattants échangent des regards inquiets. La brute qui se tient près de vous hésite un instant avant de cracher avec un rictus :{/n} « De toute façon on va crever, alors autant essayer de pas finir en hérétiques ! Mort aux monstres ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Démoralisés, épuisés, les combattants échangent des regards inquiets. La brute qui se tient près de vous hésite un instant avant de cracher avec un rictus :{/n} « De toute façon on va crever, alors autant essayer de pas finir en hérétiques ! Mort aux monstres ! »

languages.text: {n}La gente, cansada y derrotada, intercambia miradas de preocupación. El gran bruto que tienes a tu lado titubea, después escupe y sonríe.{/n} «Si vamos a morir de todos modos, ¡que sea sin la marca de los herejes! ¡Matad a estas bestias!».
languages.original_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La gente, cansada y derrotada, intercambia miradas de preocupación. El gran bruto que tienes a tu lado titubea, después escupe y sonríe.{/n} «Si vamos a morir de todos modos, ¡que sea sin la marca de los herejes! ¡Matad a estas bestias!».

languages.text: {n}Erschöpfte und besiegte Gesichter tauschen beunruhigte Blicke aus. Der imposante Hüne neben dir zögert, dann spuckt er aus und grinst breit.{/n} "Wir werden sowieso sterben, dann doch lieber ohne das Brandmal des Ketzers! Tötet die Monster!"
languages.original_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Erschöpfte und besiegte Gesichter tauschen beunruhigte Blicke aus. Der imposante Hüne neben dir zögert, dann spuckt er aus und grinst breit.{/n} "Wir werden sowieso sterben, dann doch lieber ohne das Brandmal des Ketzters! Tötet die Monster!"

languages.text: {n}Yorgun düşmüş yenik yüzler, endişeli bakışlarla birbirlerini süzüyor. Yanında duran devasa adam, bir anlığına tereddüt ediyor. Ardından tükürerek sırıtmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Nasılsa öleceğiz, en azından kâfir damgası yemeden ölelim! Yaratıkları gebertin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Exhausted and defeated faces trade worried glances. The hulking brute next to you hesitates, then spits and breaks into a grin.{/n} "We're going to die anyway, might as well do it without the heretic's brand! Slay the beasts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yorgun düşmüş yenik yüzler, endişeli bakışlarla birbirlerini süzüyor. Yanında duran devasa adam, bir anlığına tereddüt ediyor. Ardından tükürerek sırıtmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Nasılsa öleceğiz, en azından kâfir damgası yemeden ölelim! Yaratıkları gebertin!"
